sentences.en: She was a good golfer and tennis player.
sentences.cn: 她曾是一名优秀的高尔夫球手和网球运动员。

sentences.en: Sarazen became the first golfer to win all four majors.
sentences.cn: 萨拉曾成为了第一个赢得全部4场大赛的高尔夫球员。

sentences.en: He declared his intention to become the best golfer in the world.
sentences.cn: 他表明了要成为世界上最佳高尔夫球手的意愿。
